title: Dashboard Launched
author: SecondTab
summary: The new dashboard system is now live.
content: Today we officially launched the new SecondTab dashboard.
This update introduces a cleaner layout, faster navigation, and future expansion support.
More features like dynamic content and user customization are coming soon.

title: Official Release Date Confirmed!
author: SecondTab
content: We're exited to annouce our official release date!
We'll be opening SecondTab to the public on January 10th.
We've added safeguards to make sure none of the links get blocked, and we can always change them if they do.
